meta.name: 香港海豚保育學會 Hong Kong Dolphin Conservation Society
meta.about: 香港海豚保育學會是香港唯一專為香港鯨豚而設的學會 HKDCS is the only society dedicated to conservation of dolphins & porpoises

meta.name: 香港海豚保育學會 HKDCS
meta.about:
🐬 Hong Kong Dolphin Conservation Society | The only society dedicated to the conservation of dolphins and porpoises in HK
👇🏻Be the game changer 環評遊戲

meta.name: HKDCS
meta.about:
中華白海豚是最受香港市民喜愛的動物之一，但大眾對這種神秘的動物仍不太了解。我們致力於研究、推廣及教育工作，以加深市民對本地及世界各地海豚的認識，從而更有效地保護這奇妙的動物。請到我們的 Facebook 專頁  (http://www.facebook.com/HKDCSorg) 給一個'讚好'，並瀏覽網站 www.hkdcs.org 以獲取更多鯨豚資訊。 

Chinese white dolphin is one of the most celebrated wildlife adored by the Hong Kong public. By education and research work, we aim to enhance the knowledge of general public on cetaceans in Hong Kong and around the world, and to effectively protect them in a long run. Please "Like" our Facebook page (http://www.facebook.com/HKDCSorg), and visit our website www.hkdcs.org in order to get more updated news!
